author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to block external URLs that are deemed malicious or pose a threat to the organization's network. This includes configuring web filtering, firewalls, and other security appliances to effectively block access to these URLs. It is essential for preventing unauthorized access and mitigating potential attacks from external sources.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
Network monitoring tools and access to network infrastructure for analysis and control.

title: Establish Ability to Block External URLs

references.name: Network Security Controls and Traffic Filtering
NIST SP 800-41 Rev. 1: Guidelines for Firewall and Network Security
